title: Planet India: How the Fastest Growing Democracy Is Transforming America and the World
description: A cutting-edge exploration of America's stake in India's ongoing efforts to become a global power depicts the region as the world's fastest-growing center of technology, global economics, and democracy, outlining the challenges facing the country to enable rapid change in environmentally sustainable and politically viable ways. 75,000 first printing.
author: Mira Kamdar
